articles.content: Between 2009 and 2018 the Aston Martin Vantage won Le Mans twice, the FIA World Endurance Championship SEVEN times and a load of international sportscar titles (like British GT, the European Le Mans … [+947 chars]

articles.title: Sisk poaches ISG data centre project chief - Construction Enquirer
articles.description: Andy Cook joins Sisk as UK data centre chief after seven years at ISG
articles.content: As UK Sector Lead Data Centres, Cook brings experience from projects up to £600m in construction value, for international clients, including procurement and management of all major vendor equipment.… [+1427 chars]
